description.p: The update center NBM to install in the platform in order to define a new update center from which you will be able to download all the other GP components.

GP is available as a zip file containing:
GP API
GP.nbm (to install directly from within NetBeans)
GP.jar (to place manually in the module directory of your NetBeans user directory)

You can also directly download :
GP-2.0.nbm : the NetBeans module
GP-2.0-api.zip : only the GP Javadoc
GP-2.0-src.zip : same as GP-bin.zip with source code

UL.li:
The logging Module zip file containing:
The logging Module nbm file (to install directly from within NetBeans).
The logging Module jar file (to place manually in the module directory of your NetBeans user directory).
The logging api.
